name: Defender Lance I
description: A lance crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Lance II
description: A fortified lance designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Lance
description: A fortified lance designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Lance III
description: A fortified lance designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Spear II
description: A Kamura-crafted spear. Despite its appearance, it's pretty easy to handle.

name: Kamura Spear I
description: A Kamura-crafted spear. Despite its appearance, it's pretty easy to handle.

name: Kamura Spear III
description: A Kamura-crafted spear. Despite its appearance, it's pretty easy to handle.

name: Guardian Lance
description: Used by village defenders, this lance fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Kamura Spear IV
description: A Kamura-crafted spear. Despite its appearance, it's pretty easy to handle.

name: Kamura Ninja Spear
description: Molded by Kamura fire and technique, its brilliance can pierce darkness itself.

name: Kamura Spear V
description: A Kamura-crafted spear. Despite its appearance, it's pretty easy to handle.

name: Kamura Warrior Spear
description: Molded by Kamura fire and technique, its brilliance can pierce darkness itself.

name: Fine Kamura Spear
description: The village hero forfends all foes with unyielding shield and unstoppable spear.

name: Mastlayer
description: Despite its blood-soaked history, even the purest of knight can be seduced by this evil lance.

name: Duke's Impaler
description: An imposing and noble lance, befitting a knight of the realm. Its shield is majestic.

name: Kamura Warrior Spear+
description: Molded by Kamura fire and technique, its brilliance can pierce darkness itself.

name: Goss Lance I
description: Resembles a Goss Harag's beefy arm. Perfect for making shish kebabs of foes.

name: Goss Lance II
description: Resembles a Goss Harag's beefy arm. Perfect for making shish kebabs of foes.

name: Abominable Lance
description: Strike fear into your foes' hearts! Or just strike them with the Abominable Lance.

name: Abominable Spear
description: Strike fear into your foes' hearts! Or just strike them with the Abominable Lance.

name: Abominable Spike
description: Wear down monsters from behind a wall of ice, then poke until frozen solid!

name: Abominable Spear+
description: Strike fear into your foes' hearts! Or just strike them with the Abominable Lance.

name: Hana Mo Hana Nare I
description: Like flower petals in the wind, this lance reminds all of life's ephemeral nature.

name: Hana Mo Hana Nare II
description: Like flower petals in the wind, this lance reminds all of life's ephemeral nature.

name: Kimi Ga Kiru
description: The Hana Mo Hana Nare's evolved form. Beautifully dispenses with life.

name: Kimi Ga Kiru+
description: The Hana Mo Hana Nare's evolved form. Beautifully dispenses with life.

name: Kimi Ga Kiru Kasa+
description: Like cloud-capped mountains, may this spear forever protect you and your smile.

name: Kimi Ga Kiru Kasa
description: Like cloud-capped mountains, may this spear forever protect you and your smile.

name: Naag Serpentblade I
description: Poisoned lance made from Remobra material. Made to cause pain and suffering.

name: Devta Serpentblade
description: The Naag Serpentblade's enhanced form. Laced with a cripplingly painful poison.

name: Devta Serpentblade+
description: The Naag Serpentblade's enhanced form. Laced with a cripplingly painful poison.

name: Naag Serpentblade II
description: Poisoned lance made from Remobra material. Made to cause pain and suffering.

name: Ouroboros Serpentblade
description: Unparalleled pain awaits those who feel the gentle embrace of this poisonous blade.

name: Distension I
description: Much coveted by Tetranadon fans. The spearhead seems kind of slimy, though...

name: Croaker
description: An enhanced Distension. Its brazen attacks can even break through steel.

name: Distension II
description: Much coveted by Tetranadon fans. The spearhead seems kind of slimy, though...

name: Croaker+
description: An enhanced Distension. Its brazen attacks can even break through steel.

name: Peeper
description: A lance which excels at thrust attacks to slip through the preys defense and strike a weak spot.

name: Peeper+
description: A lance which excels at thrust attacks to slip through the preys defense and strike a weak spot.

name: Wind Thief Lance II
description: A lance made of Great Izuchi parts. So light, its thrusts are frighteningly fast.

name: Wind Thief Lance I
description: A lance made of Great Izuchi parts. So light, its thrusts are frighteningly fast.

name: Gale Lance+
description: A lance infused with wind. Use its gale-force power to fight for justice!

name: Gale Lance
description: A lance infused with wind. Use its gale-force power to fight for justice!

name: Great Gale Lance
description: Sharper than ever, the spear flies straight and true, its honor never faltering.

name: Sharktooth Spear I
description: An icy, serrated spear. Freezes any foes it happens to take a chunk out of.

name: Sharktooth Spear II
description: An icy, serrated spear. Freezes any foes it happens to take a chunk out of.

name: Razortooth Spear
description: A Sharktooth Spear enhanced to be chillingly powerful. Welcome to the ice age.

name: Razortooth Spear+
description: A Sharktooth Spear enhanced to be chillingly powerful. Welcome to the ice age.

name: Spinetooth Spear
description: The sub-zero chill of this lance can turn the soul of its prey to a lump of ice.

name: Iron Lance II
description: A lance for newcomers made with lots of attention to minute details.

name: Millennial Lance
description: The Iron Lance's final form comes with crystals that give it more oomph.

name: Iron Lance I
description: A lance for newcomers made with lots of attention to minute details.

name: Paladin Lance I
description: A lance given to a battle- hardened knight. Notable for its large shield.

name: Paladin Lance II
description: A lance given to a battle- hardened knight. Notable for its large shield.

name: Rampart
description: The Paladin Lance's final form. Well-balanced and true to the chivalric code.

name: Rampart+
description: A further enhanced Paladin Lance. Well-balanced and true to the chivalric code.

name: Watchtower
description: An enhanced Rampart+. A sign of supremacy by those who've mastered the art of chivalry.

name: Watchtower+
description: An enhanced Rampart+. A sign of supremacy by those who've mastered the art of chivalry.

name: Babel Spear I
description: A golden lance as stately as its namesake, with both good offense and defense.

name: Babel Spear II
description: A golden lance as stately as its namesake, with both good offense and defense.

name: Elder Babel Spear
description: A weapon fit for the golden knight of legend, he who faced a vindictive god.

name: Lost Babel
description: Long ago, a golden lance was bestowed upon a knight for conquering the tower of Babel.

name: Elder Babel Spear+
description: A weapon fit for the golden knight of legend, he who faced a vindictive god.

name: Lost Babel+
description: Long ago, a golden lance was bestowed upon a knight for conquering the tower of Babel.

name: Frostmoon Spirilance
description: The arctic chill concentrated at the tip of this lance has formed a sharp, unbreakable layer of ice.

name: Frostmoon Spirilance+
description: The arctic chill concentrated at the tip of this lance has formed a sharp, unbreakable layer of ice.

name: Venom Lance I
description: A lance made from poisonous Basarios parts. Injects venom into enemies.

name: Venom Lance II
description: A lance made from poisonous Basarios parts. Injects venom into enemies.

name: Lunarcry
description: The flashes of crimson fury in this spiral of ice is a symbol of its desire to pierce its prey.

name: Basarios Venom Spear+
description: The Venom Lance's enhanced form has poison capable of stopping any beating heart.

name: Basarios Venom Spear
description: The Venom Lance's enhanced form has poison capable of stopping any beating heart.

name: Basalt Venom
description: It is said that the amount of poison in this spear could fell even an ancient dragon.

name: Hidden Stinger I
description: An inky black lance. Its bloodlust blots out the sky, enmeshing all in gloom.

name: Hidden Stinger II
description: An inky black lance. Its bloodlust blots out the sky, enmeshing all in gloom.

name: Avidya Lance
description: A weapon of darkness created by an assassin of the ancient world. Forged from suffering incarnate.

name: Night Rains Black
description: The Hidden Stinger's final form puts any monster out of its misery fast.

name: Purple Darklance
description: A lance as dark as the night. The souls it has consumed are sublimated with darkness.

name: Purple Darklance+
description: A lance as dark as the night. The souls it has consumed are sublimated with darkness.

name: Growling Wyvern I
description: A spear so formidable its owner can fend disaster off singlehandedly.

name: Growling Wyvern II
description: A spear so formidable its owner can fend disaster off singlehandedly.

name: Roaring Wyvern
description: The strength of the Growling Wyvern's enhanced form is limited only by its wielder.

name: Roaring Wyvern+
description: The strength of the Growling Wyvern's enhanced form is limited only by its wielder.

name: Raging Wyvern
description: A lance sharp enough to pierce wyvern scale, and a shield strong enough to ward off evil.

name: Kadachi Lance I
description: A lance made of Tobi-Kadachi scale. Electrically charged, its power is truly shocking.

name: Kadachi Lance II
description: A lance made of Tobi-Kadachi scale. Electrically charged, its power is truly shocking.

name: Shockspear
description: An enhanced Kadachi Lance. Lightning may not strike twice, but this sure does.

name: Shockspear+
description: An enhanced Kadachi Lance. Lightning may not strike twice, but this sure does.

name: Thunderlance
description: A renowned artisan imbued this spear with the power of Tobi-Kadachi. Its ringing thunder pierces prey.

name: Thunderlance+
description: A renowned artisan imbued this spear with the power of Tobi-Kadachi. Its ringing thunder pierces prey.

name: Aknosom Lance I
description: A superbly ornamented lance. Its multi-layered anatomy lets it absorb great force.

name: Aknosom Lance II
description: A superbly ornamented lance. Its multi-layered anatomy lets it absorb great force.

name: Dawnbreaker Lance
description: A lance for the virtuous, the color of morning light creeping over the horizon.

name: Dawnmoon Piercer
description: A lance of an Aknosom that can extend and contract in the blind of an eye. A symbol for victory.

name: Dawnmoon Lance
description: A lance imbued with the soul of a pale knight who desires only peace and protection.

name: Aknosom Lance III
description: A superbly ornamented lance. Its multi-layered anatomy lets it absorb great force.

name: Rugged Lance I
description: A lance that's as solid as a Barroth. Better for sweeping than for thrusting.

name: Rugged Lance II
description: A lance that's as solid as a Barroth. Better for sweeping than for thrusting.

name: Barroth Carver
description: An enhanced Rugged Lance. Crafted to be so hard that nothing can break it.

name: Niter Spear
description: An enhanced Barroth Carver. Crafted to be so hard that nothing can break it.

name: Niter Spear+
description: An enhanced Barroth Carver. Crafted to be so hard that nothing can break it.

name: Barroth Borer
description: A rank destroyer, capable of demolishing a cliff-top fortress in a single strike.

name: Drill Lance I
description: A lance once used to mine ore. Its rotator mechanism can release electricity.

name: Drill Lance II
description: A lance once used to mine ore. Its rotator mechanism can release electricity.

name: Exadrill Lance
description: This heavily enhanced lance defies logic, boring through even elder dragon scales.

name: Gigadrill Lance+
description: A lance that drills rather than tears, leaving great scars in its wake.

name: Gigadrill Lance
description: A lance that drills rather than tears, leaving great scars in its wake.

name: Exadrill Lance+
description: This heavily enhanced lance defies logic, boring through even elder dragon scales.

name: Veil of Lightning
description: A lance forged from an Astalos tail. Thin, but thin's all you need to carry thunder.

name: Veil of Lightning+
description: A lance forged from an Astalos tail. Thin, but thin's all you need to carry thunder.

name: Verdant Lightning
description: The emerald lightning gushing from this weapon is a sign of its lust for battle.

name: Volvi Sweep
description: The Volvi Stroke's final form has flexibility that makes kills extra quick.

name: Volvi Stroke II
description: Like the Volvidon it came from, once there's a target, it goes straight to kill.

name: Volvi Sweep+
description: The Volvi Stroke's final form has flexibility that makes kills extra quick.

name: Volvi Swindler+
description: Crafted from Volvidon shell for elasticity, this spear flies with godlike speed.

name: Heat Lance I
description: Scorching fire within has heated this powerful lance up to a searing temperature.

name: Volvi Swindler
description: Crafted from Volvidon shell for elasticity, this spear flies with godlike speed.

name: Heat Lance II
description: Scorching fire within has heated this powerful lance up to a searing temperature.

name: Heatstinger
description: An enhanced Heat Lance. This lance's mighty inferno will incinerate any enemy.

name: Heatstinger+
description: An enhanced Heat Lance. This lance's mighty inferno will incinerate any enemy.

name: Heat Impaler
description: This ultimate form of the Heat Lance has a flaming tip that'll burn prey from the inside out.

name: Bone Lance I
description: A bone lance that stands up to snuff. Fans love its wild decorative bits.

name: Hard Bone Lance
description: The Bone Lance's supreme form reigns as the king of savage weaponry.

name: Longtusk Spear
description: An enhanced spear made from quality bone. Its might belies its plain design.

name: Longhorn Spear I
description: A straightforward lance that's light, sturdy, and easy to maintain.

name: Barbarian Tusk I
description: Spear popular among the roughest, rowdiest hunters. Also called a "Skull Lance."

name: Barbarian Fang
description: The Barbarian Tusk's final form. For when a messy, brutal stab is in order.

name: Harbah Lance
description: The countless Seregios scales covering the blade of this lance resembles a crown of thorns.

name: Harbah Lance+
description: The countless Seregios scales covering the blade of this lance resembles a crown of thorns.

name: Turbulent Lance
description: The enhanced version of the Harbah Lance. Its sharpness grants it a menacing air.

name: Bone Claw Lance
description: Made from a generous pile of crab parts. Dazzles with a red and white color scheme.

name: Bone Claw Lance+
description: Made from a generous pile of crab parts. Dazzles with a red and white color scheme.

name: Red Lord Lance
description: An enhanced form of the Bone Claw Lance. Its obscene red shade darkens with use.

name: Ceanataur Stinger+
description: Offensive Lance with great Sharpness. Made from the hard shell of a Shogun.

name: Ceanataur Stinger
description: Offensive Lance with great Sharpness. Made from the hard shell of a Shogun.

name: Ceanataur Piercer
description: The enhanced form of the Ceanataur Stinger effortlessly pinpoints a foe's vitals.

name: Tiger Stinger I
description: A weapon that's as strong as it looks. Pierces anything that gets in its way.

name: Tiger Stinger II
description: A weapon that's as strong as it looks. Pierces anything that gets in its way.

name: Tigrex Lance+
description: The Tiger Stinger's final form is made only to stab really, REALLY well.

name: Great Tigrex Lance
description: A spear single-mindedly intent on running headlong through any and all prey.

name: Tigrex Lance
description: The Tiger Stinger's final form is made only to stab really, REALLY well.

name: Tusk Lance I
description: An icy lance made from a Barioth tusk. Cold enough to freeze vapor in the air.

name: Great Tigrex Lance+
description: A spear single-mindedly intent on running headlong through any and all prey.

name: Tusk Lance II
description: An icy lance made from a Barioth tusk. Cold enough to freeze vapor in the air.

name: Sabertooth
description: This form of the Tusk Lance rules the cold and strikes faster than frostbite.

name: Frosttooth
description: A new style Sabertooth that rules the cold and strikes faster than frostbite.

name: Frosttooth+
description: A new style Sabertooth that rules the cold and strikes faster than frostbite.

name: Pukei Spear I
description: A poisonous lance made of Pukei-Pukei parts. Requires VERY careful handling.

name: Ivory Ice
description: A keener, colder tundra-ruling Barioth lance that turns all creation to ice in a flash.

name: Datura Spear
description: An enhanced Pukei Spear. A more potent poison slowly eats away at foes' vitality.

name: Pukei Spear II
description: A poisonous lance made of Pukei-Pukei parts. Requires VERY careful handling.

name: Datura Spear+
description: An enhanced Pukei Spear. A more potent poison slowly eats away at foes' vitality.

name: Datura Stellaspear
description: A spear enhanced with rare Pukei-Pukei materials. Its tip drives poison to the core.

name: Datura Stellaspear+
description: A spear enhanced with rare Pukei-Pukei materials. Its tip drives poison to the core.

name: Red Tail I
description: A lance made of a Rathalos tail. Scorching flames erupt from the thin body.

name: Red Tail II
description: A lance made of a Rathalos tail. Scorching flames erupt from the thin body.

name: Spear of Prominence
description: The Red Tail's improved form brings the fires of hell right to your doorstep.

name: Rosenranze
description: Espinas lance. The crimson thorns it hides brim with prickly poison.

name: Spear of Prominence+
description: The Red Tail's improved form brings the fires of hell right to your doorstep.

name: Rosenranze+
description: Espinas lance. The crimson thorns it hides brim with prickly poison.

name: Lejeu Prominence
description: The scarlet flames gushing from this weapon are a sign of its lust for battle.

name: Rosenbegierde
description: Enhanced form of the Rosenranze. Its crimson thorns are a shield to defend, and a sword to attack.

name: Spiral Lance I
description: A water-filled lance made of Royal Ludroth bone. Shoots pressurized water into prey.

name: Spiral Splash
description: The Spiral Lance's final form shoots water that drills deep into flesh.

name: Spiral Splash+
description: The Spiral Lance's final form shoots water that drills deep into flesh.

name: Golm Tower
description: A single thrust of this lance is powerful enough to pierce multiple enemies simultaneously.

name: Golm Tower+
description: A single thrust of this lance is powerful enough to pierce multiple enemies simultaneously.

name: Spiral Vortex
description: The endless flow of water from this lance enhances and strengthens its piercing power.

name: Spiral Vortex+
description: The endless flow of water from this lance enhances and strengthens its piercing power.

name: Spiral Lance II
description: A water-filled lance made of Royal Ludroth bone. Shoots pressurized water into prey.

name: Ploshasta I
description: A lance made of Rhenoplos parts that's balanced and handles well.

name: Gorkotos
description: The destructive power of this lance can destroy rock-hard shell with a single blow.

name: Diablos Lance I
description: A lance made from the thick, sharp horn of a Diablos, the dignified desert king.

name: Rhenoplos Spear
description: The Ploshasta's final form is well-balanced to handle every situation.

name: Diablos Lance II
description: A lance made from the thick, sharp horn of a Diablos, the dignified desert king.

name: Rhenohasta+
description: The Ploshasta's final form is well-balanced to handle every situation.

name: Diablos Spear+
description: An enhanced Diablos Lance. This majestic weapon's tip eradicates any opposition.

name: Ploshasta II
description: A lance made of Rhenoplos parts that's balanced and handles well.

name: Diablos Spear
description: An enhanced Diablos Lance. This majestic weapon's tip eradicates any opposition.

name: Cera Creos
description: Harboring a proud dune- master's spirit, nothing repels this weapon's tip.

name: Cera Creos+
description: Harboring a proud dune- master's spirit, nothing repels this weapon's tip.

name: Usurper's Coming I
description: A lance embodying a fierce king. Decimates foes with lightning-charged thrusts.

name: Kulu Skewer+
description: An enhanced Kulu Spear. Its incredible power is all in the beak.

name: Kulu Katolos Spear
description: A lance forged from sharpened Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. Its tip glistens as it strikes its prey.

name: Kulu Spear I
description: Made from Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. The shield's adorning wings are particularly fetching.

name: Kulu Spear II
description: Made from Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. The shield's adorning wings are particularly fetching.

name: Despot's Cacophony
description: Banish the unworthy to hell with the enhanced form of the Usurper's Coming.

name: Usurper's Coming II
description: A lance embodying a fierce king. Decimates foes with lightning-charged thrusts.

name: Despot's Cacophony+
description: Banish the unworthy to hell with the enhanced form of the Usurper's Coming.

name: Oppressor's Genesis
description: This lance holds the strength of the true king. Its thunderous attacks can rip open the sky.

name: Azure Crest I
description: A lance made of Great Baggi parts. A soporific fluid sprays from its tip.

name: Great Azure
description: A truly nightmarish lance. This weapon will plunge foes into an eternal sleep.

name: Azure Crest II
description: A lance made of Great Baggi parts. A soporific fluid sprays from its tip.

name: Bandera Azul
description: Who wields this lance? But eternal sleep ensues, and the question remains a mystery.

name: Great Azure+
description: A truly nightmarish lance. This weapon will plunge foes into an eternal sleep.

name: Azure Crest III
description: A lance made of Great Baggi parts. A soporific fluid sprays from its tip.

name: Sinister Spear I
description: A trident lance made from Magnamalo's tail. Fell power lurks within its shaft.

name: Sinister Spear II
description: A trident lance made from Magnamalo's tail. Fell power lurks within its shaft.

name: Eiferschild
description: An ogreish shield to bind the soul, and a black trident to ferry it to the netherworld.

name: Sinister Shadespear
description: This spear lusts for blood to tame the madness inside, but can never be satisfied.

name: Eiferschild+
description: An ogreish shield to bind the soul, and a black trident to ferry it to the netherworld.

name: Mighty Soulscreamer
description: A mountain of wyvern corpses was needed to tame this weapon's crazed spirit.

name: Devil's Deliverance
description: The azure flames of wyvern souls dance around this weapon of utter carnage.

name: Zornesschild
description: A jet-black lance with its true power unleashed. It craves any and all souls it can find.

name: L'Égide
description: The shield's third eye finds weakness, and the iridescent Lance exploits it.

name: Le Paladin
description: A golden lance that brings a cold yet beautiful light flowing into the world.

name: Demon Lance I
description: A golden lance made of beautiful Rajang horn. Its thrust releases lightning.

name: Demon Lance II
description: A golden lance made of beautiful Rajang horn. Its thrust releases lightning.

name: Great Demon Lance+
description: The lightning this form of the Demon Lance shoots can bring forth disaster.

name: Great Demon Lance
description: The lightning this form of the Demon Lance shoots can bring forth disaster.

name: Demonlord Rajang
description: A lance made with Rajang horn. Its angry, golden glow darts at targets with lightning force.

name: Raging Demon Lance
description: The ultimate form of the Demon Lance, sharp and deadly as a possessed beast's fangs.

name: Azure Elder Spear I
description: Like Ibushi's second coming, this lance wields the raging fury of the Wind Serpent.

name: Azure Elder Spear II
description: Like Ibushi's second coming, this lance wields the raging fury of the Wind Serpent.

name: Abyssal Gale Lance
description: The unstoppable roar of Wind Serpent Ibushi forces evil to flee from this spear.

name: Skybore Twister
description: One sight, one strike, and no prayer for the prey. Even gods gape at this spear.

name: Thunderbolt Spear I
description: A fair and just lance— neither the strong nor weak are spared from slaughter.

name: Abyssal Storm Lance
description: Let Kamura's protector take spear in hand, and usher in a thousand years of peace.

name: Rookslayer Lance II
description: Lance that uses Bazelgeuse's explosive power. Its strikes blow foes to smithereens.

name: Bazel Myniad Lance
description: A spear that could singe the very heavens above with its torrents of explosive power.

name: Rookslayer Lance I
description: Lance that uses Bazelgeuse's explosive power. Its strikes blow foes to smithereens.

name: Bazel Myniad Queentaker
description: A spear that could singe the very heavens above with its torrents of explosive power.

name: Icesteel Spear I
description: Spear cold enough to freeze the earth with one stab. Can change life into permafrost.

name: Daora's Fang
description: The Icesteel Spear's final form. Time feels stopped for those frozen by it.

name: Daora's Fang+
description: The Icesteel Spear's final form. Time feels stopped for those frozen by it.

name: Daora's Regulus
description: An ice lance wreathed in frozen breath. It points toward prey as though alive.

name: Teostra's Roar+
description: The Teostra's Howl's final form sets the world aflame to establish its dominion.

name: Teostra's Howl I
description: A ferocious lance that spits hot fire. Genuine power worthy of a king.

name: Redwing Spear I
description: Crafted from Valstrax parts. The tip has enough draconic power to slice the heavens.

name: Teostra's Fire
description: Strike the heavens, and the skies blaze. Strike the earth, and hellfire reigns.

name: Crimson Sharpwing
description: If it's power you want, this is the weapon for you. Glows red with a dragon's power.

name: Abyssal Icicle
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The fifth was an ice shaft scraping the sky.

name: Dark Lance+
description: A black lance fashioned from rigid Neopteron parts. The horn contains a stun agent.

name: Dark Lance
description: A black lance fashioned from rigid Neopteron parts. The horn contains a stun agent.

name: Plegis Needle I
description: A lance that makes use of paralytic mushrooms. Toxins leak out with each thrust.

name: Dark Spear
description: An enhanced Dark Lance. Its paralyzing agents wreak all sorts of havoc.

name: Plegis Needle II
description: A lance that makes use of paralytic mushrooms. Toxins leak out with each thrust.

name: Mighty Plegis
description: The Plegis Needle's final form can knock monsters paralyzingly senseless.

name: Mighty Plegis+
description: The Plegis Needle's final form can knock monsters paralyzingly senseless.

name: Mycetic Stupor
description: A spear laced with a potent paralytic serum that steals freedom and starves souls.

name: Alacrantze I
description: Its resemblance to scorpions isn't skin deep; even pricks from this are poisonous.

name: Alacrantze II
description: Its resemblance to scorpions isn't skin deep; even pricks from this are poisonous.

name: Scorpion Lance
description: The Alacrantze's final form packs poison that can knock out large monsters.

name: Alacrantze III
description: Its resemblance to scorpions isn't skin deep; even pricks from this are poisonous.

name: Scorpion Lance+
description: The Alacrantze's final form packs poison that can knock out large monsters.

name: Hadrurus Lance
description: Contains poison so deadly it'll kill you, then dissolve your body until there is no trace left.

name: Fragrance I
description: A lance modeled after a flower bud. Looks beautiful, and effuses a lovely scent.

name: Fragrance II
description: A lance modeled after a flower bud. Looks beautiful, and effuses a lovely scent.

name: Classy Fragrance
description: This form of the Fragrance smells nice enough to coax foes to a perfumed death.

name: Classy Fragrance+
description: This form of the Fragrance smells nice enough to coax foes to a perfumed death.

name: Elegant Fragrance
description: Hunter and prey alike swoon at the sunlit petals' beauty, slaves to its floral charm.

name: Royal Order's Guard
description: A lance used by knights of the Order. Only those who defend the weak may wield it.

name: Antique Machina L
description: A lance of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Royal Order's Guard+
description: A lance used by knights of the Order. Only those who defend the weak may wield it.
